These classes are {{rconcept|TagSpecifier}}s for use with {{ltt|cpp/experimental/ranges/utility/tagged|ranges::tagged}}.

The name of a specifier is also the element name it corresponds to. For instance, {{c|ranges::tagged&lt;std::pair&lt;int, int&gt;, tag::min, tag::max&gt;}} provides a set of named accessors named {{tt|min}} and a set of named accessors named {{tt|max}}.
